Package com.flag4j.operations.concurrency

Interface BinaryThreadFactory<M>

Type Parameters:
M - The storage type for the tensor.
public interface BinaryThreadFactory<M>
A factory for creating threads for binary, element-wise operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Runnable
    makeThread​(M dest, M src1, M src2, int start, int end)
    Creates a thread for performing a binary tensor operation concurrently.

  • Method Details

    • makeThread

      Runnable makeThread​(M dest, M src1, M src2, int start, int end)
      Creates a thread for performing a binary tensor operation concurrently.
      Parameters:
      dest - Destination array for binary operation.
      src1 - Entries of first tensor in the operation.
      src2 - Entries of second tensor in the operation.
      start - Staring index for thread to work on.
      end - Ending index thread to work on.
      Returns:
      The created thread.
